attributes.description:
This SPECIAL Price subject to in house finance only selling below cost.
EXQUISITE INTERIOR
Performance style-design accents are visible throughout the new Corsa’s ergonomic interior with luxurious ambient lighting, such as clear and concise Driver Instrument Clusters and the flat-bottom steering wheel.
STYLISH ALLOY WHEELS
Styllish 16-inch alloy wheels to selected models to take you from the showroom into the spotlight!
180° PANORAMIC REAR-VIEW CAMERA
Reversing just got safer and easier, especially in the city and narrow parking spaces. The Panoramic Rear-View Camera provides a 180° overhead view of the back of your Corsa and what's around it. You'll be a reversing pro before you know it.
Experience a high level of connectivity with the new OPEL Corsa! It boasts a 7” IntelliLink Touchscreen Infotainment System with Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™.
OPEL Corsa offers a total of 6 airbags including driver, passenger, side and curtain airbags to contribute towards the overall safety of your new Corsa and its occupants.
ISOFIX Child Seat Anchorage.
MULTI-FUNCTION STEERING WHEEL
Performance and style combine in the new OPEL Corsa, resulting in elegant driver enhancements such as the 3-spoke flat-bottom steering wheel with steering wheel controls for infotainment, DIC and other functions such as Cruise Control.
CRUISE CONTROL SPEED LIMITER
The new OPEL Corsa's Cruise Control with Speed Limiter allows the driver to set a consistent speed without using the accelerator – easily contro

attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.

attributes.title: 2011 Hyundai ix35 2.0 GL | Premium

attributes.description:
The 0,9 l turbo engine is capable of 66 kW. The big advantage is the fuel consumption that’s rated at 5.4 litres/100km –
and personally, aside from a hybrid, this must be one of the most fuel efficient cars I have ever driven.. The generous
cabin space is easily accessible from the door openings and once inside you will notice that there is an above-average
amount of headroom. Shoulder room is also rather surprising given the external dimensions of the Sandero Stepway
TechRoad. Rear legroom is adequate at best with the front seats in a comfortable position.Renault has done well to
keep the ageing Stepway relevant and the new additions really do make it an appealing choice.Contact Variety Motors
for more inquiries. Own it because you worth it.
